All Apps

Mover

Windows

MDM Device Migration Utility

Automated Windows Device Migration

Automate the MDM migration of your Windows devices to Workspace ONE UEM

Migrate Between Workspace ONE Environments

Automate the re-enrollment of Windows devices between different Workspace ONE UEM Tenants

Retain Entra ID Join

When migrating from Intune to Workspace ONE UEM, Mover keeps the device joined to your Entra ID Domain.
